title: Cream of Crab Soup
ingredients: ['50g margarine', '1 spring onion, finely chopped', '1 stick celery, chopped', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '500ml fish stock', '500ml milk', '500ml whipping cream', '675g crab meat, flaked', '4 tablespoons sherry', '1 1/2 teaspoons salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '275g hard-boiled eggs (optional)', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '6 slices lemon (optional)']
